links.to_node: refuse to take care of the dog unless my sister steps up and takes responsibility.
I may feel angry or resentful towards my older sister for not helping with the dog
My mother and younger sister may feel overwhelmed and burdened by the additional responsibility of taking care of the untrained dog.
The untrained dog may continue to suffer from lack of proper care and attention
The living environment in the small apartment may continue to be unpleasant due to the dog's untrained behavior
Tension and conflict within the family may increase due to the ongoing issue of the untrained dog
The dog's well-being and quality of life may not improve unless significant changes are made
